text: I want to cry on someone My life isn t the worst  nor is it the best  But I have been dealing with depression for the past   years  and at points I just want to let it all out  Sometimes I can t  I just won t cry  I want someone to cry on when I am sad and depressed  I can t with my parents because it s too embarrassing  and with friends  well that s not really an option  I ve never truly planned of suicide but today might be the day  I want to have a wife and a beautiful daughter  I want to go to different countries and explore  but due to my crippling anxiety problems I don t see that ever happening  I can t live like this  No one will love me nor let me cry on them  I want to know why I m alone  why my parents didn t want me  I m adopted  And most of all I want to know what the meaning of this torturous life is
summary: Today might be the day I commit suicide. I want to have a wife and a daughter and go to different countries. I don't see that ever happening due to my crippling anxiety problems. I am alone and I am adopted.
cleaned: today day commit suicide want wife daughter different country not happen crippling anxiety problem adopt

text: I m exhausted  my best friend of five years said she doesn t care if I feel suicidal  It s not like I m gonna hurt myself  I just wanted my best friend there  But she s replaced me as I m going through the hardest point of my life  I m so depressed It s like she s the one person in the world I really want to care  And she just keeps moving away from me  I have no family or anything I m just me  And she can have any friends she wants  So I m just the garbage that gets tossed to the curb  I m so hurt  Not to mention it s just been a really hard month of not having enough food in the house and just all together struggling  Like I d love an actual warm meal  Walking home three miles in the dark and cold everynight from work it s just so hard  I just can t seem to get ahead in life and I m just so tired  It just feels like I can t do anything right  And now my best friend doesn t even want me  She won t say it but she s just slowly phasing me out  It s like how many blows can I take  And now the lonely holidays begin
summary: My best friend of five years is slowly phasing me out. I'm depressed and I can't seem to get ahead in life. I have no family or anything. I walk home three miles in the dark and cold every night from work.
cleaned: good friend year slowly phase depressed not ahead life no family walk home mile dark cold night work
